entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
